description: |-
  Fetches a single n8n variable by ID or key. Since the n8n API doesn't provide a GET /variables/{id} endpoint, this datasource uses the LIST endpoint with client-side filtering.
---

# n8n_variable (Data Source)

Fetches a single n8n variable by ID or key. Since the n8n API doesn't provide a GET /variables/{id} endpoint, this datasource uses the LIST endpoint with client-side filtering.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) Variable identifier. Either `id` or `key` must be specified.
- `key` (String) Variable key. Either `id` or `key` must be specified.
- `project_id` (String) Project ID the variable belongs to

### Read-Only

- `type` (String) Variable type
- `value` (String, Sensitive) Variable value
